org.mcavallo.opencloud.formatters
Class HTMLFormatter

java.lang.Object
  org.mcavallo.opencloud.formatters.HTMLFormatter

public class HTMLFormatter
extends java.lang.Object

Class to convert a tag cloud in HTML/CSS code.

Method Detail

addCss

public void addCss(java.lang.String fragment)
Adds a generic CSS statements.

Parameters:
fragment - The CSS fragment to add.

addCss

public void addCss(java.lang.String selector,
                   java.lang.String statements)
Adds CSS statements associated with a selector. The selector can contain the %tag-weight-int% specifier. In this case the statements will be repeated for each weight level and the %tag-weight-int% specifier will be substituted by the level number.

Parameters:
selector - Selector (e.g. "body", "#id", "a.class:hover")
statements - Statements to add (e.g. "font-size: 14px;")

addCss

public void addCss(java.lang.String selector,
                   java.lang.String property,
                   java.lang.String value)
Adds a CSS statement associated with a CSS selector. The selector can contain the %tag-weight-int% specifier. In this case the statements will be repeated for each weight level and the %tag-weight-int% specifier will be substituted by the level number.

Parameters:
selector - Selector (e.g. "body", "#id", "a.class:hover")
property - Property (e.g. "font-size")
value - Value (e.g. "14px")

addCss

public void addCss(java.lang.String selector,
                   java.lang.String property,
                   java.lang.String lowValue,
                   java.lang.String highValue)
Adds a CSS statement associated with a CSS selector. The statement will vary with the weight level. If the selector does not contain a %tag-weight-int% specifier, the level number will be appended to the selector string.

Parameters:
selector - Selector (e.g. "body", "#id", "a.class:hover")
property - Property (e.g. "font-size")
lowValue - Value associated with the lowest level (e.g. "10px")
highValue - Value associated with the highest level (e.g. "30px")

addCss

public void addCss(java.lang.String selector,
                   java.lang.String property,
                   java.lang.String[] values)
Adds a CSS statement associated with a CSS selector. The statement will vary with the weight level. If the selector does not contain a %tag-weight-int% specifier, the level number will be appended to the selector string.

Parameters:
selector - Selector (e.g. "body", "#id", "a.class:hover")
property - Property (e.g. "font-size")
values - Array of values associated with levels. The last value correspond to the highest level. If the array size equals the number of levels, the first value correspond to the lowest level. If the array size is less than the number of levels, the first value is used for the remaining levels.

html

public java.lang.String html(Cloud cloud,
                             java.util.Comparator<? super Tag> comparator)
Converts a tag cloud in HTML/CSS code. Tags are sorted using the given comparator. The generated CSS code is inserted inline using the <style> tag.

Parameters:
cloud - The Cloud to convert.
comparator - Comparator used to sort tgs.
Returns:
The output HTML and CSS code.

html

public java.lang.String html(Cloud cloud)
Converts a tag cloud in HTML/CSS code. The generated CSS code is inserted inline using the <style> tag.

Parameters:
cloud - The Cloud to convert.
Returns:
The output HTML and CSS code.

css

public java.lang.String css(Cloud cloud)
Returns the CSS code associated with a tag cloud.

Parameters:
cloud - The Cloud object
Returns:
The output CSS code.

Bottom HTML template.

setHtmlTemplateBottom

public void setHtmlTemplateBottom(java.lang.String htmlTemplateBottom)
Sets the Bottom HTML template that will inserted after all tags.

Parameters:
htmlTemplateBottom - Bottom HTML template.

getHtmlTemplateTag

public java.lang.String getHtmlTemplateTag()
Returns:
Tag HTML template.

setHtmlTemplateTag

public void setHtmlTemplateTag(java.lang.String htmlTemplateTag)
Sets the Tag HTML template that will repeated for each tag. Can contain one of the following specifier: %tag-name% Tag name. %tag-link% Tag link. %tag-weight% Tag weight as a double. %tag-weight-int% Tag weight as an intger. %tag-score% Tag score. %tag-norm-score% Tag normalized score.

Parameters:
htmlTemplateTag - Tag HTML template.

getHtmlTemplateTop

public java.lang.String getHtmlTemplateTop()
Returns:
Top HTML template.

setHtmlTemplateTop

public void setHtmlTemplateTop(java.lang.String htmlTemplateTop)
Sets the Top HTML template that will inserted at the beginning of the cloud.

Parameters:
htmlTemplateTop - Top HTML template.
